participant_1.background: my father drove a car for nascar. i am terrified of scorpions. i've a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. i have a dogs. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
